name: Dettol Anti Bacterial Wet Wipes
description:
Current Promotional Period: 19-Feb-2025 To 18-Mar-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities HighlightsKills 99.9% of harmful germs.Keep your family hygienically clean.Reviewed by the Federation of Private Medical Practitioners Association Malaysia. The soft textured fabric gently cleanses skin without irritation.Leaves your skin feeling refreshed and with a light fragrance. Alcohol, formaldehyde, and optical brightener free.Comes with a lid making it easy to store after opening the packet. No water is needed. On-the-go protection.  Dettol’s trusted anti-bacterial ingredient kills 99.9% of harmful germs and protects from a wide range of harmful germs. The soft textured fabric gently cleanses your skin without irritation. The sheets are pre-moisturized with purified water. After use the skin is left feeling fresh and with a light fragrance. Dettol wipes are Alcohol, formaldehyde, and optical brightener-free. This product meets the safety and assessment standards of globally renowned Reckitt Benckiser and completed skin tests.Usage direction: turn over the paper lid take a sheet out and use it. It can be used for wiping hands on the go, before/after eating, for outdoor activity, before/after using the toilet, at the office and school & in the car when traveling. It can be used on surfaces also. No need to use water or soap. Just wipe the surface/skin and dispose of the sheet properly. Safety direction: avoid swallowing or putting it in the mouth. If irritation occurs, stop use and seek medical attention. Avoid direct contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with water. Close the lid after use immediately to avoid drying. After dispose of the wipe in the rubbish bin and do not flush down the toilet. It is only for external use and is not to be used on babies under 1 year old. About the Manufacturer: Dettol Anti-Bacterial Wet Wipes is made in China and imported by Reckitt Benckiser Bangladesh Ltd. Dettol is a registered Trademark of Reckitt Benckiser PLC headquartered in England. The first Dettol product was manufactured in the year 1932 in England. Dettol is now the world’s most trusted germ-kill brand.

Dettol’s trusted anti-bacterial ingredient kills 99.9% of harmful germs and protects from a wide range of harmful germs. The soft textured fabric gently cleanses your skin without irritation. The sheets are pre-moisturized with purified water. After use the skin is left feeling fresh and with a light fragrance. Dettol wipes are Alcohol, formaldehyde, and optical brightener-free. This product meets the safety and assessment standards of globally renowned Reckitt Benckiser and completed skin tests.
Usage direction: turn over the paper lid take a sheet out and use it. It can be used for wiping hands on the go, before/after eating, for outdoor activity, before/after using the toilet, at the office and school & in the car when traveling. It can be used on surfaces also. No need to use water or soap. Just wipe the surface/skin and dispose of the sheet properly. 
Safety direction: avoid swallowing or putting it in the mouth. If irritation occurs, stop use and seek medical attention. Avoid direct contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with water. Close the lid after use immediately to avoid drying. After dispose of the wipe in the rubbish bin and do not flush down the toilet. It is only for external use and is not to be used on babies under 1 year old. 
About the Manufacturer: Dettol Anti-Bacterial Wet Wipes is made in China and imported by Reckitt Benckiser Bangladesh Ltd. Dettol is a registered Trademark of Reckitt Benckiser PLC headquartered in England. The first Dettol product was manufactured in the year 1932 in England.
